Text: Re Hello to youwas thrilled to hear from you today I sure miss you and Robin Seems strange not to be driving to your house on Thursdays now I have a little more free time now so I can quilt and visit with my grandchildren Mel is back to work now and maybe things will be getting back to some what of a normal life for us The past year and half has been hard on us I know we just have to be patient and things will get better You just go along with life and then when you or your spouse has health problems it creates a whole new ball game I have great faith in the Lord to see us through any thing Mel said to say hi too he just came up to my office When you get an address please email me that so when I finish your quilt I can mail it to you Hope you find a nice man and your life becomes so full that maybe work will take a back seat Maybe a big house you can fill with kids Take care of yourself and let me hear from you again Love Kathy GET INTERNET ACCESS FROM JUNO Juno offers FREE or PREMIUM Internet access for less Join Juno today For your FREE software visit gettagj

Re Hello to youme know all about what materializes with your man hunt Everyone needs a mate I think It is nice to share with another person who is kind and loving towards you and will be there through thick and thin I know I wish I could see all of you in Houston but that isnt in the cards I just bet Robin and Katie will have a great time with the new little girls I just love Molly and Liam and I now think I am a grandmother by adoption Molly is growing so much I am still cleaning houses while Mel is back at work It is tough for him as he still doesnt feel good I just handle one day at a time right now Things have been better for us and I pray they will be that way again One never knows what the good Lord has in store for us In June we are going to Sand Point Idaho for a week with our daughter her husband and year old grandson A working dude ranch Can you believe that They have a lake with fish and nice golf course for Mel horses for those who want to ride all day even a cattle drive but for me I just want to rest read and not clean houses I am getting anxious for summer now Nice weather always brings out the best in people Now that I have been so long wined and yakked your ear off I will go clean my own house Love Kathy ps If you ever get back here on business or whatever and need a place to lite my home is open to you I have extra bedrooms that are ready for visitors Guess I could open a Bed and Breaks fast GET INTERNET ACCESS FROM JUNO Juno offers FREE or PREMIUM Internet access for less Join Juno today For your FREE software visit gettagj
